bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Digital Test Interchange Format (DTIF)
IEEE Standard for Digital Test Interchange Format (DTIF)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The information content and the data formats for the interchange of digital test program data between digital automated test program generators (DATPGs) and automatic test equipment (ATE) for board-level printed circuit assemblies are defined. This information can be broadly grouped into data that defines the following: user under test (UUT) model, stimulus and response, fault dictionary, and probe.

The information content and the data formats for the interchange of digital test program data between digital automated test program generators (DATPGs) and automatic test equipment (ATE) for board-level printed circuit assemblies are defined. This information can be broadly grouped into data that defines the following: user under test (UUT) model, stimulus and response, fault dictionary, and probe.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
